overview:
Stefano is a self-taught software developer, and lead co-founder of CyberCafePro Software Inc, which was sold in 2000, then subsequently sold to Sweden based Global Gaming Factory, then sold again in 2009 to San Francisco based OneRoof Inc.

Stefano has since contracted services to Global Gaming Factory, and OneRoof Inc up until December 2010, when he went on his own to begin a new ‘Stealth’ startup project.
